lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japanese prime minister Yasuhiro Nakasone and President Reagan will meet Thursday and Friday to discuss trade tensions between their two countries, while at the same time the Democratic-led U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Recent weakness in currencies and strength in the dollar has been more the result of nervous shortcovering ahead of the meeting rather than reaction to the White House statement Monday supporting a stable dollar, said Harris bank currency analyst Earl Johnson.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Recent firmness in the federal funds rate and the Federal Reserve's slowness in adding reserves to the banking system has heightened sentiment that the money-policy making body has already tightened credit and a discount rate hike is possible, analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Recent firmness in the federal funds rate and the Federal Reserve's slowness in adding reserves to the banking system has heightened sentiment that the money-policy making body has already tightened credit and a discount rate hike is possible, analysts said.
